title: Custom International Destination Event Planning & Management | CSI DMC
text:
International
Exceptional knows no boundaries with CSI DMC. Your trusted source for all Destination and Event Management services has gone global to create Exceptional Experiences, Every Time, Anywhere…

Lynda Baum
Lynda Baum +1 408-234-7518 lynda.baum@csi-dmc.com
International
Planning events overseas can be daunting – different languages, currencies, regulations. CSI DMC is the solution to your global program needs. With the same service-driven approach, our international experts provide a high level of expertise, creativity, and value that is consistent across our entire company. We have the knowledge and connections to successfully deliver exceptional experiences around the world, instilling the confidence and security of a trusted partner in our clients.  Where to next?
